A '''Grass Egg''' is a type of Pokémon Egg that can hatch Grass-type Pokémon. ==Details== ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn |- | Bulbasaur || | Chickorita || Treecko |- | Oddish || | Hoppip || Roselia |- | Bellsprout || | Sunkern || Tropius |- | Tangela || | || |} ===Acquisition=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location !! Price |- | Lavender Town || | 1000 Quest Points |} {{Eggs}}
